url_parse_error: I can't make out what you sent
is_not_youtube_url_error: The link should be in YouTube
invalid_url_error: It seems you didn't send the link, please send the link to the YouTube video so that I can download it for you
is_not_video_url_error: You sent a link to the YouTube website, you need a link to a YouTube video
